job.title: Software Engineer

job.description: strongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongstrongThe RolebrbrstrongAs a Software Engineer on the Client team youll get the opportunity to develop your skills and collaborate across Fidelity teams in a lively and dynamic environment Working closely with our technical leads you will build secure scalable and resilient cloudbased microservices Using modern Java frameworks youll help craft and implement REST API clients and services exchange asynchronous messages between services and use SQL databases to manage data Youll also write automated unit and integration tests package software using containers coordinate builds using continuous integration pipelines and prepare your services for deployment to AWSbrbrstrongThe Expertise And Skills You BringbrstrongulliBachelors degree in building and deploying applications using continuous integration pipelines and automated deployment tools such as JenkinsliliUnit and integration test automation using JUnitliliHardworking and open to learning new tools and developing with the latest technologies and frameworksliliCan work well in a small agile team in a very collaborative environment where your ideas are welcomeliliProven analytical communication and organizational skillsbrbrliulstrongThe TeambrbrstrongFidelity Digital Assets a Fidelity Investments Company is developing a fullservice enterprisegrade platform for storing trading and servicing digital assets such as Bitcoin and EthereumbrbrFidelity Digital Assets adopts a resultsoriented culture and startup attitude while serving as one of the most innovative business units within Fidelity Investments Our global diverse team of 130 forwardthinking professionals lead with agility and creativity to build solutions that bridge the gap between traditional institutional investors and their exposure to digital assets The firms tenure and experience across multiple business lines present our employees with outstanding access to knowledge technology and resources that help the team reshape the future of financebrbrWithin Fidelity Digital Assets the Client Engineering team is responsible for the development of backend services to manage client onboarding account information entitlements and authorization services The team writes code in Java and uses technologies such as Spring Boot Docker PostgreSQL and SQSbrbrstrongCertificationsbrbrstrongCompany OverviewbrbrAt Fidelity Investments our customers are at the heart of everything we do As a privately held company with a rich 75year history our mission youll find endless opportunities to build a meaningful career that positively impacts peoples lives including yours You can take advantage of flexible benefits that support you through every stage of
